data.eml:eml: A new genus and five new species of the Meconematini (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Meconematinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Hanqiang, Liu, Xianwei, Li, Kai, Fang, Yan (2012): A new genus and five new species of the Meconematini (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Meconematinae). Zootaxa 3521: 51-58, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282662
